examples.name: weave
examples.example:
Though the sun has long risen,

some alleys remain pitch dark as she [weaves] through the slum where she lives in Mumbai’s Goregaon West neighborhood.

尽管太阳早已升起，

但当她[??]她所住的孟买戈雷甘西区贫民窟时，一些小巷仍然漆黑一片.

examples.name: weave
examples.example:
The strips of willow are [woven] into baskets.

用柳条[??]成篮子。
